author: Slidebean
description:
Nvidia just hit $5 trillion: the biggest gold rush in tech history.

Nvidia became the first $5 trillion publicly traded company, now worth more than the combined stock markets of every country except the U.S., China, and Japan.

It jumped from $4T to $5T in just a few months but sure, it’s not a bubble. 
Every chatbot, startup, and AI tool runs on Nvidia chips.

They’re not digging for gold, they’re selling the shovels. 

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: Nvidia’s $5T milestone shows who’s really winning the AI race.
